text: "United" is a 1980 song by British heavy metal band Judas Priest and is the final single from their sixth studio album British Steel. It went to number 26 in the United Kingdom and number 27 in Ireland. The single was released along with its B-side Grinder. ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Judas Priest songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Heavy metal
title: United (Judas Priest song)
